key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions in raw materials and electronic components
Economic sensitivity tied to industrial and construction activity
Intense competition in the welding industry leading to margin compression
Regulatory compliance challenges across multiple jurisdictions
Potential labor disputes or unionization efforts in certain regions
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing carbon footprint and improving energy efficiency
social_issues: Potential labor disputes or unionization efforts in certain regions
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance challenges across multiple jurisdictions
